p: The impact of interventions on HIV incidence among PWID and/or their sexual partners is in Table 3 and Figures 2 and 3. Reducing sharing by 25%, 50% and 75% respectively was associated with a similar proportional reduction in the number of incident infections among PWID. Reducing sharing by 25% would avert 20 to 53 infections per year in Afghanistan, Libya, Morocco and Tunisia; over 800 infections in Egypt; and about 1700 infections in Iran and Pakistan each. A reduction in sharing by 75% would avert over 5000 infections per year in each of Iran and Pakistan (Table 3).
